Instagram Data Privacy Case Study

From August 2023 to December 2023, I was enrolled in the Needs Assessment and Usability Evaluation course (SI-422) at the University of Michigan. Over the course of 5 months, I developed my research skill set by conducting user experience research and usability testing related to data privacy on Instagram. This portfolio will cover the motivation, deliverables, and conclusions drawn from this case study.
